channel.title: People on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics
channel.description: Recent content in People on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics

item.title: Ali Jan Qadir
item.description: Connects SIPEG research with stakeholders through outreach and communications.

item.title: Dr. Tayyeb Shabbir
item.description: Advises on finance, risk, and governance, connecting macro trends to board-level decision-making.

item.title: Dr. Matthew McCartney
item.description: Guides SIPEG on economic development, urbanization, migration and China’s impact on the regional global economic shifts.

item.title: Ali Jaffer Zaidi
item.description: Offers strategic perspectives, historical framing, and narrative thinking for SIPEG’s research and outreach.

item.title: Jean-Luc Racine
item.description: Advises on South Asia–Europe relations, regional connectivity, and comparative geopolitical perspectives.

item.title: Haseeb
item.description: Supports data collection, analysis, and publication workflows across SIPEG projects.

item.title: Ali Jan Qadir
item.description: Supports outreach and storytelling to broaden the impact of SIPEG’s research and events.

item.title: Ayesha Siddique
item.description: Conducts applied research across political economy, with a particualr focus on China- Pakistan, emerging trends and changing dynamics in the 21st Century.

item.title: Dr. Ahsan Rana
item.description: Advises on social policy design, institutional reform and state capacity, linking emperical research to governance practice. Developing linkanges between agricultural practices and economic development.

item.title: Dr. Mariam Saeed Shafqat
item.description: Advises on science, technology, education, and curriculum development needs of Pakistan in the 21st Century.

item.title: Dr. Rabia Chaudhry
item.description: Leads research on development studies, climate change, migration, urbanization and globalization

item.title: Guillaume Beaud
item.description: Postoctoral researcher, University of Oxford, Department of Politics and IR (UK) Associate researcher, Sciences Po, Center for International Studies (France)

item.title: Mobeena Saeed Shafqat
item.description: Keen researcher on syncronizing literature and history; culture, identity and cultural change.

item.title: Professor Dr. Saeed Shafqat
item.description: Leads SIPEG’s strategic direction across research, advisory, stakeholder engagement, collaborations and on re-defining Pakistan’s evolving role in a changing world.

item.title: Raza Shahid
item.description: Connects SIPEG research with stakeholders through outreach and communications.
